entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:18 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
